T02D2444:71b-0: @71b bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2444:71b-1: rgyal sras mi yi seng ge yis //
T02D2444:71b-2: mkha' 'gro ma yi gsang tshig brtol //
T02D2444:71b-3: grub thob nyams kyi rtogs pa rnams //
T02D2444:71b-4: bka' rgya bkrol to gtad rgya byas //
T02D2444:71b-5: a'arya de bas thugs kyi rtogs pa mgur du bzhengs pa /
T02D2444:71b-6: kye ho phung po lha yi ngo bor gnas //
T02D2444:71b-7: bum pa'i dbang bskur rang la rdzogs //
T02D2444:71b-8: sgra stong brag ca lta bur rtogs //
T02D2444:71b-9: gsang ba'i dbang la ltos mi dgos //
T02D2444:71b-10: nyams myong bde chen khong nas sad //
T02D2444:71b-11: shes rab ye shes dbang dang ldan //
T02D2444:71b-12: chos rnams nam mkha' lta bur rtogs //
T02D2444:71b-13: bzhi pa'i dbang gis don dang ldan //
T02D2444:71b-16: // / n'a g'a rdzu nas gsungs pa /
T02D2444:71b-17: kye ho rtsa ba bral ba'i sems nyid 'di //
T02D2444:71b-18: chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin //
T02D2444:71b-20: bde sdug gnyis kyi lo 'dab rgyas //
T02D2444:71b-21: sna tshogs las kyi 'bras bu smin //
T02D2444:71b-25: kye ho sna tshogs snang la ngos gzung med //
T02D2444:71b-26: 'di zhes mtshon pa'i tshig dang bral //
T02D2444:71b-27: mi g-yo mi sems sems chen po //
T02D2444:71b-28: bla dags tsam du brjod par zad //
T02D2444:71b-29: 'di la don du gzung du med //
T02D2444:71b-32: // / rdo rje dril bu pas gsungs pa /
T02D2444:71b-33: kye ho dbang ldan padma'i dbus na bde ba'i ye shes gnas //
T02D2444:71b-34: thabs kyi sbyor bas spros bral lhan cig skyes pa 'char //
T02D2444:71b-35: bde gshegs thugs kyi gdams pas nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam //
T02D2444:71b-36: 'di ni gsang sngags thabs kyi gnad do ngo mtshar che //
T02D2444:71b-40: phung po'i dbus na gnyug ma'i ye shes me gcig po //
T02D2444:71b-41: srog dang rtsol bas bskyod na bde ba'i ye shes 'bar //
T02D2444:71b-42: bdag 'dzin sreg pa'i me ni rlung gis spar bar bya //
T02D2444:71b-43: bde chen mchog ni nam mkha'i khams su mi shong ngo //
T02D2444:71b-47: kye ho sems ni ye shes chen po ste //
T02D2444:71b-48: 'di las gud na sangs rgyas med //
T02D2444:71b-49: sems kyi de nyid shes gyur na //
T02D2444:71b-54: kye ho 'gro ba sna tshogs las kyis bcings //
T02D2444:71b-55: las kyi de nyid shes gyur na //
T02D2444:71b-56: bcings pa med de grol ba med //
T02D2444:71b-57: sgyu mkhan ri mo ji bzhin no //
T02D2444:72a-2: // g-yog po ljon pa can gyis gsungs pa /
T02D2444:72a-3: kye ho he ru ka dpal rdo rje'i sku //
T02D2444:72a-4: rnal 'byor ma ni las kyi yum //
T02D2444:72a-5: sna tshogs snang ba mchog gi zhing //
T02D2444:72a-6: 'gro ba lha dang lha mo ste //
T02D2444:72a-10: // / aa ba dh'u t'i pas gsungs pa ;
T02D2444:72a-11: / gshis kyi stong nyid 'o ma'i mtsho //
T02D2444:72a-12: thabs kyi rol pa srub ma'i shing //
T02D2444:72a-13: dad brtson she mas rtsol byas na //
T02D2444:72a-14: sku gsum mar gyi gong bu 'dri la //
T02D2444:72a-17: // / dur khrod dbang phyug gis smras pa /
T02D2444:72a-18: mthong du med do sems kyi don //
T02D2444:72a-19: bsam du med do gnyug ma'i ngang //
T02D2444:72a-20: dgag sgrub med pa smyon pa'i lus //
T02D2444:72a-21: btsal du med pa gyad kyi nor //
T02D2444:72a-24: // / ye shes skyong gis smras pa /
T02D2444:72a-25: kye ho snang stong dbyer med lhan cig skyes //
T02D2444:72a-26: rig stong dbyer med lhan cig skyes //
T02D2444:72a-27: gnyis med ye shes lhan cig skyes //
T02D2444:72a-28: rgyu 'bras dbyer med lhan cig skyes //
T02D2444:72a-29: 'di la tha dad ngas ma mthong //
T02D2444:72a-32: // / li la'i zhabs kyis gsungs pa /
T02D2444:72a-33: sna tshogs snang ba rang gi sems //
T02D2444:72a-34: sems ni sems kyi rang bzhin bral //
T02D2444:72a-35: thig le chen po chos kyi sku //
T02D2444:72a-36: 'di las mi spro gzhi la bzhag / gsung ngo /
T02D2444:72a-38: // / nyi ma sbas pas gsungs pa /
T02D2444:72a-39: lus la ye shes chen por gnas //
T02D2444:72a-40: bde ba drod kyis sbar bar bya //
T02D2444:72a-41: las kyi rtsi bur sreg par byed //
T02D2444:72a-42: bla ma'i bka' las shes par bya //
T02D2444:72a-47: srid rtsa'i sdong po gcod par byed //
T02D2444:72a-48: rtsa yi rgyal po spangs pa yis//
T02D2444:72a-49: thar pa'i srog shing 'dzugs par byed //
T02D2444:72a-50: bde chen nam mkha'i ba bzhos pas //
T02D2444:72a-51: lhan cig skyes pa ston par byed //
T02D2444:72a-55: nyi zla stod la mnan pa yis //
T02D2444:72a-56: las kyi phreng thag gcod par byed //
T02D2444:72a-57: spu gri klad la bskor ba yis //
T02D2444:72a-58: bya bran nam mkha'i dbyings su skrod //
T02D2444:72a-59: bya ba zin pa'i skyes bu de //
T02D2444:72a-60: 'a ma'i pang du rgyug par byed //
T02D2444:72a-63: // / phyogs kyi glang pos smras pa /
T02D2444:72a-64: rig pa'i sgron me sbar ba yis //
T02D2444:72a-65: log rtog mun pa rab bsal te //
T02D2444:72a-66: gzhan gyi sde pa kun bcom nas //
T02D2444:72a-67: rang gi mtshan nyid mtshon du med //
T02D2444:72b-0: // / @72b dpa' bo dril bu'i zhabs kyis smras pa /
T02D2444:72b-1: dga' ba'i ye shes spar ba yis //
T02D2444:72b-2: gnyug ma'i lhan cig skyes pa rtogs //
T02D2444:72b-4: gsang sngags thabs kyis khyad par 'phags //
T02D2444:72b-7: // / li la'i bzang pos smras pa /
T02D2444:72b-8: lkugs pa'i kha dang rus sbal mig //
T02D2444:72b-9: gzhon nu ma yi bde ba'am //
T02D2444:72b-10: khur bar chu blugs ji bzhin du //
T02D2444:72b-11: mtshon du 'dug par ngas ma mthong //
T02D2444:72b-14: // / n'a ga bo dhis gsungs pa /
T02D2444:72b-15: gnyis med spros bral nam mkha'i dang //
T02D2444:72b-16: ming med ye shes bde chen po //
T02D2444:72b-17: bsam med brjod pa'i mtha' las 'das //
T02D2444:72b-18: 'gyur med chos sku ngo mtshar che //
T02D2444:72b-22: ltos shig nam mkha'i dkyil du ltos //
T02D2444:72b-23: ma mthong ba ni de mthong yin //
T02D2444:72b-24: sdod cig rgya mtsho'i gting du sdod //
T02D2444:72b-25: mi g-yo ba ni dgongs pa yin //
T02D2444:72b-26: zung shig bar snang rlung po zung//
T02D2444:72b-27: ngos gzung med na stong pa yin //
T02D2444:72b-30: // / nag po zhabs kyis gsungs pa /
T02D2444:72b-31: lam gyi de nyid mthong goms na //
T02D2444:72b-33: las kyi 'phen pa nam mkhas khyer //
T02D2444:72b-34: dus der chos nyid ma bu phrad //
T02D2444:72b-37: // / bhi na zhabs kyis smras pa /
T02D2444:72b-38: snang stong thabs dang shes rab la //
T02D2444:72b-39: bla ma'i ngo sprod brda yis rol //
T02D2444:72b-40: rig pa'i ye shes khong nas sad //
T02D2444:72b-41: bde chen lhan cig skyes pa rtogs //
T02D2444:72b-45: sna tshogs snang ba las kyi phyag rgya ste //
T02D2444:72b-46: der 'dzin stong pa chos kyi phyag rgya yin //
T02D2444:72b-47: gnyis med dang las mi 'da' dam tshig ste //
T02D2444:72b-48: der 'dzin blo dang bral na phyag rgya che //
T02D2444:72b-51: // / mtsho skyes rdo rjes smras pa /
T02D2444:72b-52: lte ba mkha' dbyings gru gsum du //
T02D2444:72b-53: rig pa'i lha mo'i skur gsal te //
T02D2444:72b-55: sku gsum gzhan nas btsal mi dgos //
T02D2444:72b-58: // / gu dha ri pas gsungs pa /
T02D2444:72b-59: ye shes rdo rje nam mkha'i mdog //
T02D2444:72b-61: dmigs pa med par kun la khyab //
T02D2444:72b-63: ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa'i don //
T02D2444:73a-0: @73a * // kye ho ltos shig yul la ltos //
T02D2444:73a-1: snang ba sna tshogs rig pa'i rtsal //
T02D2444:73a-2: 'dod yon sna tshogs sems kyi rgyan //
T02D2444:73a-3: bde sdug sna tshogs gnyug ma'i rtsal //
T02D2444:73a-4: gar yang ma phyin nam mkha'i bya //
T02D2444:73a-5: snang ba sna tshogs gzigs mor che //
T02D2444:73a-9: spyi gtsug padma'i gdan stengs su //
T02D2444:73a-10: mtshan ldan bla ma'i spyan snga ru //
T02D2444:73a-11: rtsa dar dkar gyi lam la 'gro shes na //
T02D2444:73a-12: mtshams med lnga po byed kyang grol //
T02D2444:73a-13: gsang sngags thabs kyi khyad par yin //
T02D2444:73a-17: rtse gsum gsal ba'i me long la //
T02D2444:73a-18: sems kyi rgyal po lta shes na //
T02D2444:73a-19: 'khrul pa'i yul gyis mi phrogs te //
T02D2444:73a-20: gnyug ma'i rdzong la nges par gnas //
T02D2444:73a-24: ka ra yul la bcings pa yis //
T02D2444:73a-25: rtog pa'i 'gyu ba gcod par byed //
T02D2444:73a-26: lta stangs snga phyi brjes pa yis //
T02D2444:73a-27: bying rgod thun skyon sel bar byed //
T02D2444:73a-28: gnyen po'i rtsol ba bshig pa yis //
T02D2444:73a-29: gnyug ma rang la 'khor bar byed //
T02D2444:73a-33: las kyi phyag rgya las byung ba'i //
T02D2444:73a-34: dga' bzhi'i ye shes phyag rgya che //
T02D2444:73a-35: snang ba zag med spros dang bral //
T02D2444:73a-36: gnyug ma don gyi ye shes mthong //
T02D2444:73a-40: sems nyid spros dang bral ba nam mkha'i dang //
T02D2444:73a-41: rgya mtsho shel dang me tog bzhin //
T02D2444:73a-42: sang de rje ne sa le ba //
T02D2444:73a-43: dran du med cing yengs su med //
T02D2444:73a-44: ci rigs tsam du goms par gyis //
T02D2444:73a-48: gnyis med ye shes chen po 'di //
T02D2444:73a-49: bstan du yod de mtshon du med //
T02D2444:73a-50: goms su yod de bsgom du med //
T02D2444:73a-51: myong du yod de brjod du med //
T02D2444:73a-55: snang ba'i ngo bo stong pa'i ror //
T02D2444:73a-56: spor cig yul la yengs pa'i tshe //
T02D2444:73a-57: bde ba'i ngo bor gsal ba'i ror //
T02D2444:73a-58: spor cig sems la bltas pa'i tshe //
T02D2444:73a-59: rtogs pa'i ngo bor nyams kyi ror //
T02D2444:73a-60: spor cig chags sdang skyes pa'i tshe //
T02D2444:73a-64: sna tshogs sna tshogs de de nyid //
T02D2444:73a-65: dgag pa med cing sgrub pa med //
T02D2444:73a-66: dran pa'i rtsi dang ma bral bar //
T02D2444:73a-67: spang blang med par rol du gsol //
T02D2444:73b-0: // / @73b dpa' bo rdo rjes smras pa /
T02D2444:73b-1: sems kyi thig le yi ge'i dbyibs //
T02D2444:73b-2: rlung gis bskyod de mkha' la 'phur //
T02D2444:73b-3: las kyi sgo bzhi 'gags nas kyang //
T02D2444:73b-4: bde chen gnas su 'pho bar byed //
T02D2444:73b-8: dug sprul bsad la glang chen btsong //
T02D2444:73b-9: bya ni mkha' la spar bar bya //
T02D2444:73b-10: btsun mo lha sras yul phyung la //
T02D2444:73b-11: rgyal po bcom na nges par grol //
T02D2444:73b-14: // / gnyis med sbas pas smras pa /
T02D2444:73b-15: yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas //
T02D2444:73b-16: spyi bo'i bla ma legs mchod la //
T02D2444:73b-18: bya ba mang pos ci zhig bya //
T02D2444:73b-21: // / aindra bh'u ti sa smras pa /
T02D2444:73b-22: sna tshogs yul gyi snang ba 'di //
T02D2444:73b-23: rig pa ye shes rgyan yin pas //
T02D2444:73b-24: mi spang de bzhin nyid du rol //
T02D2444:73b-28: // / ka pa tsa ris smras pa /
T02D2444:73b-29: chu bo sbubs su chud pa bzhin //
T02D2444:73b-30: sna tshogs de bzhin nyid du 'dus //
T02D2444:73b-31: rgya mtsho lan tshva'i ro bzhin du //
T02D2444:73b-32: du ma ro gcig bde bar 'bar //
T02D2444:73b-33: nags kyi me la rlung bzhin du //
T02D2444:73b-34: rkyen ngan sna tshogs lam gyi grogs //
T02D2444:73b-37: // / ku la ma ris smras pa /
T02D2444:73b-38: gzhi ma bcos chos dbyings pho brang du //
T02D2444:73b-39: lam rig pa'i ye shes lham me ba /
T02D2444:73b-40: de bde gsal stong pa'i ngar gyis rdeg / don chos sku gnyis med kyi dang du grol //
T02D2444:73b-44: ma bcos rnal ma'i shes pa de //
T02D2444:73b-45: mi bsgom de bzhin nyid du bzhag / bcos pa thams cad blo yin te //
T02D2444:73b-46: blo las grol na thar pa'i lam //
T02D2444:73b-50: gang gis sems kyi don mthong na //
T02D2444:73b-51: rtsa ba bral ba'i sdong bu bzhin //
T02D2444:73b-52: sna tshogs snang bas 'ching mi nus //
T02D2444:73b-53: sems kyi de nyid yin phyir ro //
T02D2444:73b-56: // / ra ma pha las smras pa /
T02D2444:73b-57: gang du rtogs pa blo yin la //
T02D2444:73b-58: gang du sgom pa rtog pa ste //
T02D2444:73b-59: gang du bcos kyang bcos ma nyid //
T02D2444:73b-60: ji ltar bsgrubs kyang 'dod pa'i lam //
T02D2444:73b-61: 'di kun byis pa'i rtsed mo yin //
T02D2444:73b-62: mkhas pa rnams la ci yang med //
T02D2444:73b-65: // / klu'i byang chub kyis smras pa /
T02D2444:73b-66: yi ge gsum gyi sbyor ba yis//
T02D2444:74a-0: @74a * // rlung gi de nyid shes gyur na //
T02D2444:74a-1: sems kyi de nyid rtogs par 'gyur //
T02D2444:74a-2: sems rtogs pas ni bde ba che //
T02D2444:74a-8: bcos ma'i theg pa snying re rje //
T02D2444:74a-9: rtsa ba bral ba'i don mthong na //
T02D2444:74a-10: las kyi 'khrul 'khor gzhi la 'jig / gsung ngo /
T02D2444:74a-12: // / zla ba grags pas smras pa /
T02D2444:74a-13: yod dam med pa'i mtha' spangs te //
T02D2444:74a-14: dbus kyi don la mi gnas par //
T02D2444:74a-15: bsgom du med pa'i dang la zhog / thob tu med pa'i 'bras bu 'byung //
T02D2444:74a-20: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes 'di //
T02D2444:74a-21: khyod kyis smros dang ji ltar yin //
T02D2444:74a-22: ma myong shes na myong ba'i mchog / mi btsal de bzhin nyid du bzhag / gsung ngo /
T02D2444:74a-24: // / su ka ra siddhis smras pa /
T02D2444:74a-25: gang la zhen pa'i blo de thong //
T02D2444:74a-26: rtog pa gnyis ni mtshungs par sgrib //
T02D2444:74a-27: rtog dang bral na sgom du med //
T02D2444:74a-28: bsam du med pa ji ltar dran //
T02D2444:74a-31: // / ye shes rdo rjes smras pa /
T02D2444:74a-32: kun gzhi dag pa'i dbyings nas rig pa'i nyi ma shar //
T02D2444:74a-33: rgya mtsho nor bu'i gling nas yid bzhin nor bu lon //
T02D2444:74a-34: 'gro ba'i ma rig ling tog shes rab thur mas phye //
T02D2444:74a-35: 'khor ba'i chu bo bzhi las thabs ldan bla mas bsgral //
T02D2444:74a-38: // / mtsho skyes rdo rjes smras pa /
T02D2444:74a-39: dpe yi ye shes mtshon du med //
T02D2444:74a-40: don gyi ye shes sgom du med //
T02D2444:74a-41: thabs kyi man ngag smra ru med //
T02D2444:74a-42: bla ma'i drin lan 'khor thabs med //
T02D2444:74a-46: mtshon gyi 'khor los phyogs rnams kun gyi dngos po gcod //
T02D2444:74a-47: thos pa'i 'khor los log rtog blo yi spros pa gcod //
T02D2444:74a-48: nyams kyi 'khor los gzung 'dzin 'khrul pa'i snang ba gcod //
T02D2444:74a-49: rtogs pa'i 'khor los 'khor 'das gnyis kyi re dogs gcod //
T02D2444:74a-52: // / grub thob lnga bcu'i rtogs pa brjod pa thig
T02D2444:74a-53: le 'od kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro
T02D2444:74a-54: ma'i gsang mdzod nas phyung ste rje dam pa rgya
